application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T312 - Taxus baccata:Lift low canopy, pedestrian clearance - to 2.5 m over public footpath.T313 - Acer pseudoplatanus:Epicormic growth remove from stem - minor epicormic regrowth up to 4 m to improve aesthetic.T331 - Crataegus monogyna:Reduce crown by specified extent - tip reduce extraneous lateral branches on all sides by up to 1 m to remove declining tips and encourage internal epicormic regeneration to improve aesthetic.T334 - Platanus x hispanica:Epicormic growth remove from stem - minor epicormic regrowth at 3 & 7 m to improve aesthetic.T335 - Platanus x hispanica:Epicormic growth remove from stem - minor epicormic regrowth at 3 & 5 m to improve aesthetic.Prune from adjacent structure - to clear street lamp by 2 m.T337 - Platanus x hispanica:Epicormic growth remove from stem - minor epicormic regrowth at 6 m to improve aesthetic.T100106 - Pinus wallichiana:Fell ground level - declining young pine with red band needle blight to prevent spread throughout local susceptible tree stock and facilitate replacement.Plant replacement tree - Arbutus unedo during the first planting season (September to April) following tree removal.
